about_the_game:
Have you ever thought about being a dick one day? I mean mentally or physically?
What if you are a dick and destroy all humankind because they are bigger dicks than you are?
DICKNOSAURUS is a pixel-styled, side-scrolling, and action-adventure game with a unique combination of retro and physics world-building, and an unusual story you have ever seen.



A small village deep inside the jungle is attacked by giant insects. For finding the reason and saving the villagers, Dickno will go on an adventure through the jungle toward human civilization. But he discovers the ridiculous secrets of mankind.

Is He An Ally? Is He An Enemy? Or Just A Dick…




  • This is the opening stage of Dicknosaurus and contains 4 levels to see what it looks like.

  • Classic Retro Pixel art with beautiful jungle exploration and unsuitable violence.

​*Physical Intractable objects which you are able to destroy and use for the attack.

  • All Vehicles inside a game you can drive and destroy even able to attack Enemies.

  • Focus on a specific kind of humor that you can not tell your family member or coworkers.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
